Features

Some of the world's leading companies use Codekeeper to significantly cut their costs and optimize their software escrow processes.

Our solutions

Thanks to our cutting-edge automation technology, our clients get a higher level of service for a considerably lower price than with traditional escrow agents.

The traditional way of source code escrow

MANUAL AND OUTDATED DEPOSITS

Traditional escrows require expensive manual deposits at extra costs and they take long to process.

RECOVERY PROBLEMS FOR BENEFICIARIES

Incompatible code versions, missing or incompatible data sets and multi-month release procedures.

EXPENSIVE LAWYER DRIVEN PROCESS

Waiting for expensive lawyers, who are inexperienced with technology, to draw up papers.

The Codekeeper source code escrow solution

AUTOMATED AND UP-TO-DATE DEPOSITS

Codekeeper integrates directly with developer workflows. Deposits are encrypted and fully automated.

QUICK RECOVERY

Quick recovery in case of a release event. Release procedures are processed 24/7/365, and you get expert redeployment support.

END-TO-END CONCIERGE SUPPORT
- NO LAWYER FEES

We offer complete, high quality support with each step in the process.

GET STARTED

Key Advantages

Codekeeper ensures you have reliably up-to-date source code deposits, but it also includes official escrow agreements, release terms, beneficiary management, data escrow, and an arsenal of other services tailored to your needs.

FREE ESCROW AGREEMENT

Eliminate risks of software usage, licensing, development, or transactions.

BEST PRICE GUARANTEED

We believe that everyone should have access to this kind of insurance for their mission-critical systems

NO LAWYER FEES OR HIDDEN COSTS

A free and legally sound escrow agreement comes with each Codekeeper account. Together we customize it to fit your situation. No lawyer required!

REPOSITORY SYNC

Don't waste time manually making deposits, or paying your escrow provider per deposit.

DATA BUCKETS/BLOBS

Data escrow allows you to store data as part of your escrow arrangement.

CONCIERGE SUPPORT

We offer complete, high quality support with each step in the process.

STORAGE LIMITS

We apply a fair use storage size limit on source code repositories.

Our Escrow Deposit Features

SOURCE CODE ESCROW

A source code repository (sometimes called project) is where developers store and work on software. It usually contains all versions of the code created.

DATA ESCROW

Data escrow allows you to store data as part of your escrow arrangement. Have access not just to the application, but also the data you need to pick up where you left off.

INFORMATION ESCROW

Store intellectual property, passwords, designs, or other important digital assets using this option.

LEARN MORE

Escrow Management

Need to provide additional assurance about the contents of the deposited code? We can validate the completeness, accuracy, and usability of materials deposited into escrow.

SEE OUR PRICING

CUSTOMIZABLE RELEASE TERMS

Specify for each beneficiary which source code repositories they should receive and under which conditions they should be released. Manage complex agreements with ease.

DATA ESCROW

We have storage locations in all regions of the world for both source code and data. Depending on your needs, we offer regular snapshots to full database streaming connected to DBs.

ESCROW AGREEMENTS

In addition to source code escrow, we also offer license agreements, development agreements, transaction agreements, and SaaS escrow. These include unlimited continuous deposits and complete end-to-end encryption.

Escrow agreement included

A legally sound escrow agreement comes with each Codekeeper account. Together we customize it to fit your situation. No lawyer required!

Security

ISO27001 DATA SECURITY

Our data centers adhere to the highest security standards and security policies. Security is always our first priority.

END-TO-END ENCRYPTION

Data is secured at all times, both in transit and at rest with AES256/512 encryption.

SECURE UPLOAD FOLDER

If you prefer manual upload, our upload folder system also provides you with a secure way to deposit your source code.

Protect your source code with Codekeeper

Software escrow secures the source code needed to recover if a supplier is no longer able to provide access or support the software you need for your business operations with an independent 3rd party.
